scripts.dev: pnpm build:ui && concurrently -n daemon,client,sleek,brutalist -c blue,green,magenta,cyan "pnpm --filter @vuhlp/daemon dev" "pnpm --filter client dev" "pnpm --filter @vuhlp/sleek-ui dev" "pnpm --filter @vuhlp/brutalist-ui dev"
scripts.build: pnpm build:ui && pnpm --filter @vuhlp/daemon build && pnpm --filter client build
